trans-unit.source: Provides functionality for physical and composite font embedding.
trans-unit.target: 提供的實體和複合字型內嵌功能。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the list of glyphs used by the glyph typeface.
trans-unit.target: 擷取圖像 （glyph） 的圖像字樣所使用的清單。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> value that represents the location of the glyph typeface containing the glyphs.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Uri>值，表示圖像字樣包含圖像 （glyph） 的位置。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref:System.UInt16> values that represent the glyphs.
The glyphTypeface value does not reference a previously recorded glyph typeface.
trans-unit.target: glyphTypeface 值未參考先前記錄的圖像字樣。

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection of glyph typefaces used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.RecordUsage*> method.
trans-unit.target: 傳回集合所使用的圖像字樣<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>中所指定<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.RecordUsage*>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.RecordUsage*>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref:System.Uri> values that represent glyph typefaces.
Initiates the collection of usage information about the glyph typeface and indices used by a specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 起始的使用量資訊的圖像字樣並使用指定的索引集合<xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.GlyphTypefaceUris%2A> property to return the collection of glyph typefaces used by `glyphRun`.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.GlyphTypefaceUris%2A>屬性傳回的集合所使用的圖像字樣`glyphRun`。</xref:System.Windows.Media.FontEmbeddingManager.GlyphTypefaceUris%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"></xref> whose usage information is collected.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GlyphRun"> </xref>會收集其使用方式資訊。
